Package ch.nolix.system.neuronoid

Class Neuronoid<N extends Neuronoid<N,I,O>,I,O>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.nolix.system.neuronoid.Neuronoid<N,I,O>
  • Type Parameters:
    I - - The type of the inputs of a neuron.
    O - - The type of the output of a neuron.
    N - - The type of a neuron.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BundleNeuron, FanoutNeuron, NetBackNeuron, NetFrontNeuron, Neuron, Neuron, NeuronalNet, SourceNeuron, TransformNeuron

    public abstract class Neuronoid<N extends Neuronoid<N,I,O>,I,O>
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a neuron. A neuron has several input neurons, that all provides an input of a certain type. A neuron provides an output of a certain type. When a neuron fires, it can calculate and update its output and let other neurons fire.
    Author:
    Silvan Wyss

    • Method Detail

      • addInputNeuron

        public final N addInputNeuron​(ch.nolix.system.neuronoid.Connection<?,?,I> inputNeuron)
        Adds the given input neuron to this neuron. An input neuron is a neuron this neuron can get an input from.
        Parameters:
        inputNeuron -
        Returns:
        this neuron.
        Throws:
        NullArgumentException - if the given input neuron is null.
        NonSmallerArgumentException - if this neuron has reached its maximal number of input neurons.
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if this neuron contains already the given input neuron.
